Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz

Additional Notes: Xbox 360 or equivalent gamepad required for local co-op. 64-bit version of Linux is required to play.
